      • isResolveNegativeConjunctions

        public boolean isResolveNegativeConjunctions()
        Specified by:
        isResolveNegativeConjunctions in interface ExpressionFormatter
        Returns:
        true if negative Conjunctions should be resolved via negation (e.g. !(a OR b) instead of a NOR b), false otherwise.
